org.lwjgl.opengl

Class GPU_DEVICE

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.opengl.GPU_DEVICE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class GPU_DEVICE
extends Struct
    Receives information about the display device specified by the deviceIndex parameter of the WGLNVGPUAffinity.wglEnumGpuDevicesNV(long, int, org.lwjgl.opengl.GPU_DEVICE) function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GPU_DEVICE

        public GPU_DEVICE(long struct)
        Creates a GPU_DEVICE instance at the specified memory address.

      • GPU_DEVICE

        public GPU_DEVICE(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a GPU_DEVICE instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
